entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
